description:
Dress up as Forgotten Valleyâ€™s most huggably hairy resident!


*This item will appear in your dresser once you have accepted it from the blue Deposit Box in front of your house.
*Headwear can be equipped by selecting it as a hairstyle.
*Outfits can be changed by using the mirror or dresser in your house.
*No Mukumuku were harmed in the making of this outfit.
name: Mukumuku Costume
